mapper.insert: insert into app (name, created_time) value (#{name}, now())

insert into app_interface (app_id, class_name, type, uri, request_method, method, lasted_register_time) values (#{appId}, #{info.className}, #{interfaceType}, #{info.url}, #{info.requestMethod}, #{info.method}, now())
mapper.select: select id from app_interface where app_id = #{appId} and class_name = #{info.className}
mapper.update: update app_interface set lasted_register_time = now() where id = #{id}
